column4: Any specific reasons why I should go 32bit instead of 64bit on Ubuntu Server 11.04 for a webserver?
I'm using linode.com and they offer 32 and 64 -bit.
32bit without PAE supports up to 4GB of RAM. with PAE, some huge number, and with 64bit an even huger number
though with PAE each process can still only use up to 4gb
